Back to Felix Mendelssohn

Felix Mendelssohn

Lieder ohne Worte, Book 1, op. 19b

1829–1832 · MWV U 73, 78, 80, 86, 89–90

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 16'

  • 1. E major
  • 2. A minor
  • 3. A major (Jägerlied)
  • 4. A major
  • 5. F-sharp minor
  • 6. G minor (Venetianisches Gondellied)

The collection was originally published as op. 19, the same as the Sechs Gesänge for voice and piano. Eventually, the Lieder ohne Worte became identified by op. 19b, and the Gesänge by op. 19a.

The pieces are spread over multiple entries in the Leipzig Edition catalogue.

no.MWV Uyear
1861830
2801830
3891832 or earlier
4731829
5901832 or earlier
6781830

Recommended editions

  • Bärenreiter · BA 9069 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. R. Larry Todd [including two versions of no. 1]
  • Henle · HN 327 · Klavierwerke / Band III / Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Rudolf Elvers / Ernst Herttrich
  • Könemann · K 127 · Lieder ohne Worte I · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50075 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Christa Jost [including two versions of no. 4]

Difficulty: 2.5

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5

6. G minor (Venetianisches Gondellied)

Difficulty: 2.5
